description: Beacon PeerDAS metrics according to the beacon metrics specs

panels.title: Data column sidecars submitted for processing
Data column sidecars verified for gossip

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (increase(beacon_data_column_sidecar_processing_requests_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval])) - sum by (instance) (increase(beacon_data_column_sidecar_processing_successes_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Full runtime of data column sidecars gossip verification

panels.description: Time taken to compute data column sidecar, including cells, proofs and inclusion proof
panels.title: Time taken to compute data column sidecar

panels.description: Time taken to verify data column sidecar inclusion proof
panels.title: Time taken to verify inclusion proof
Runtime of single data column kzg verification
Runtime of batched data column kzg verification
Total count of columns in custody within the data availability boundary

panels.description: Number of gossip messages sent to each topic
panels.title: Counts sent to each topic

panels.description: Number of bytes sent to each topic
panels.title: Bytes sent to each topic

panels.description: Number of gossip messages received from each topic (including duplicates)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_unfiltered_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Counts received from each topic (with duplicates)

panels.description: Number of gossip messages received from each topic (deduplicated)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Counts received from each topic (deduplicated)

panels.description: Difference between number of gossip messages received from each topic including duplicates and deduplicated

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_unfiltered_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval])) - sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Counts received from each topic (diff)

panels.description: Number of bytes received from each topic (including duplicates)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_bytes_unfiltered_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Bytes received from each topic (with duplicates)

panels.description: Number of bytes received from each topic (deduplicated)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_bytes_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Bytes received from each topic (deduplicated)

panels.description: Number of bytes received from each topic (including duplicates)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_bytes_unfiltered_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval])) - sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_bytes_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))
